授業目的: The purpose of the course is to give higher-level students the necessary tools they need to become even more proficient English communicators. Emphasis is primarily placed on speaking and listening, with pair and group work being key to success.
到達目標:
to explore and discuss a wide range of topics in detail
- to feel confident expressing your ideas and opinions
- to successfully undertake an interview in English
- to create and do a presentation based on class material
